title: Kalo Appreciation Month
context: [§8-22] Kalo Appreciation Month.  The month of October shall be known and designated as &ldquo;Kalo Appreciation Month&rdquo; to celebrate the strong kalo tradition in Hawaii and the cultural connection of native Hawaiians to kalo, the Hawaiian word for taro. This month is not and shall not be construed as a state holiday. [L 2013, c 7, §2]
